newsitem.title: USA: US jet follows futures lower; Gulf diffs retract.
newsitem.headline: US jet follows futures lower; Gulf diffs retract.

text.p: U.S. spot jet fuel prices fell sharply Friday tracking NYMEX futures, which gave up almost one cent of Thursday's 1.75-cent NYMEX gain.

Differentials on Gulf Coast 54-grade jet fuel eased about 0.20 cent, with offers of 0.85 cent over the May print in a general downturn of the Gulf distillate complex as a host of refiners attempted to unload barrels, traders said.

New York Harbor material was talked about 4.0 cents over the screen, little changed from Thursday diffs. "Today was a non-event," one New York jet fuel trader said, adding he spotted no completed deals during the day.
